2144.subject: ED
2144.course_title_long: Stage I Supervised Secondary Teaching Seminar
2144.descrlong: Taken in conjunction with ED 624, Supervised Secondary Teaching.  This course addresses issues related to topics such as adolescent development, classroom organization and management, parent involvement, social contexts of educational organizations, education policies, instruction, curricular planning, and assessment. (May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online).
